original_sentence: pros : nice size , clear (2: screen) , quick on start up , very functional and easy to use .

original_sentence: i was a bit apprehensive at first will ordering such an expensive (2: item) online , but it was delivered in perfect new condition .

original_sentence: absolutly horrible (1: product) , cheap (2: components) make for unreliable (1: product)s , but when the nearest (4: service location) is 50 + miles away i wonder how much (5: apple) truly cares ?

original_sentence: i purchased this (1: machine) on cyber monday for $ 375 ( $ 75 off the listing price at the time of this review ) and i think at that price point , it ' s well worth it .

original_sentence: this by far has been the easiest to (1: set up) and use .
translated_sentence: 지금까지 이 방법이 가장 쉽게 설정 및 사용이 가능했습니다.

original_sentence: the (2: speakers) get plenty loud , but they start to sound pretty bad when turned up a little past half volume .

original_sentence: for $ 250 i can control my $ 3000 (1: pc) anywhere .

original_sentence: have not tried customer service so no comment , but this is a nice sub $ 400 (1: machine) .

original_sentence: i give it 4 stars because i believe that these (1: devices) are perfect for adults who just want to surf the internet or watch netflix .
translated_sentence: 저는 이 기기가 인터넷 서핑이나 넷플릭스 시청만 하고 싶어하는 성인들에게 완벽하다고 생각해서 4점을 주었습니다.

original_sentence: i loved the simplicity of chrome os while enjoying the (1: flip) aspect of being able to turn it into a reading tablet when i wanted to as well .

original_sentence: its a good (1: computer) for the price but it needs to work awhile without crashing within 6 months .

original_sentence: i bought this (1: computer) a bit over two months ago for my son ' s college and after installing the windows update , it crashed !

original_sentence: the only real complain is the same one everyone else has with this model and that is the (1: battery life) could be better .

original_sentence: i am able to write , look up facts on the internet , and it has a pretty good (1: battery life) .

original_sentence: it travels well , great (2: battery life) , and is powerful enough for 100 % of the tasks i need to do ( web , streaming , word processing , reports , email ) .

original_sentence: the (1: usb - c ports) are nice and i found that a completely dead battery to fully (2: charged time) was about an hour .

original_sentence: very easy to (1: set up) and light to carry .
